claims.object: Injury to the brain from an external force

surface_layer.definition: Damage to the brain resulting from an external mechanical force.

deep_layer.mechanism: Primary and secondary injury mechanisms lead to cellular damage and dysfunction.
deep_layer.origin: Caused by accidents, falls, assaults, and other traumatic events.

epistemic_metadata.source: Metabolomics and Biomarker Discovery in Traumatic Brain Injury
